edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.race_results

Class RaceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.race_results.RaceList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class RaceList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    RaceList class holds the list of races in the WolfResults program. It has the ability to add a race, remove a race, edit a race's properties, and update it as well.
    Author:
    Varsha Gopal, Abigail Ormond

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RaceList()
      Constructor for the RaceList class that calls the other methods and creates a list of races within it

                    java.time.LocalDate date,

        Parameters:
        name - name of the race to be added
        distance - distance of race to be added
        date - date of race to be added
